cast.name: 卢塞莉亚·桑托斯 Lucélia Santos
Dante de Oliveira Dante de Oliveira

introduction: Havana Film FestivalYear	Result	Award	Category/Recipient(s)1987 	Won 	Grand Coral - First Prize 	Best DocumentaryTetê MoraesDocumentary about the oppression of a group of a thousand families who invaded Anoni Farm, a farm in the state of Rio Grande do Sul, Brazil, in 1985, and their leader, Rose, a woman fighting for the right of owning a land and for elementary human rights, and who also was the mother of the first baby born in the camping site.Based on Rose's story, a peasant without land, that, together with other 1.500 families occupied the unproductive Annoni farm, in Rio Grande do Sul, the film focus on the issue of agrarian reform in Brazil, soon after the military regime. The film shows the beginning of an important and polemic social mouvement, the MST (Mouvement of Landless Farmers). Rose gave birth to the first baby born at the camping and was killed in a strange accident.
